name: places/ChIJlZ55gYdZwokR7pA3HiaBl94
formattedAddress: 59 Allen St, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 59 Allen St, New York, NY 10002, USA

originalText.text:
I only parked here once so far but my experience couldn’t have gone any more smoothly than it did. Quick and proficient service from the staff and even received a “have a good night” from the gentleman. Can’t ask for more than that. I will use this garage again for sure!
Edit:it’s been 3 different times I’ve used this garage now! The workers were nice enough guys, handled their business, took care of my car and all had manners so I have nothing negative to say!

originalText.text: Pull in at 09:30 for the early bird special. Attendant wants to charge “EXTRA $7.00” for large vehicle. I have a Subaru Ascent and all other garages charge standard rate. This place is a scam and I left for another garage for regular early bird special which was $25.00.

text.text: Pull in at 09:30 for the early bird special. Attendant wants to charge “EXTRA $7.00” for large vehicle. I have a Subaru Ascent and all other garages charge standard rate. This place is a scam and I left for another garage for regular early bird special which was $25.00.

originalText.text: Sketchy, paid for parking until midnight but when I dropped off my car they said can “we close at 11:45” even though the sign literally says 6:00am to midnight and I had already paid. I said that would be fine, but then while i was getting out of the car, they wanted me to be there by 11:20 “for security purposes,” excuse me?? what kind of weird threat is that. never parking here again.

I said that would be fine, but then while i was getting out of the car, they wanted me to be there by 11:20 “for security purposes,” excuse me?? what kind of weird threat is that. never parking here again.

originalText.text: Rude staff who don't care about your car. Ive found scratches on the drivers side of the car that were not there before and my whole passenger door panel is MISSING. I'm beyond upset and will never come back to this poor excuse of a parking garage. I reserve at parking garages to avoid getting my car damaged or scratched up on the street. It would have been cheaper and easier to just get a parking ticket at this point. DO NOT COME HERE.

originalText.text: Worse attitude manager. My car was parked there this past Tuesday ,2/20. At around 6:10pm I go picked up my car. I paid them and tipped them. When my bring my car up, my driver’s side mirror was gone. So that’s when the employee told me that they bump my car and broke my mirror that day! The mirror glasses was scattered all on my driver’s seat!  There r huge scratches on the front of me car on left side. The painting of the car was off. Two of the employee admit that damages was from them when they bump the car. They said they will fix it and tell me to pick up Thursday morning. So for two days, I have no car and paid all the rides from going home from work and going to work. Thusday morning I went to pick my car expecting everything is fixed! But, when I see it, they replaced my mirror with the old one and also with wrong model. There is huge scratch on the mirrors and the mirror glass looks different. They didn’t fix the scratches and deny the scratches was from them. Manger was arguing with me that this scratches was not their fault and they didn’t do it! Not even an apologize from the manager, and then he blame me for the scratches. The last thing he said is “well this happens. Don’t come to park here anymore”! I called the corporation “claim department” and talk to this guy and it was also a joke. This guy makes me repeat so many times of my story and acts like he don’t know what’s going on. Act like he don’t understand the story. He took my name and number down and told me upper facility management will call me back... I’m still waiting for the call!
